DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether the use of RenalGuard system which creates high urine output with fluid balancing may prevent contrast induced nephropathy in patient undergoing cardiac resynchronization therapy (CRT) implantation.
DOC.brief_title: The Use of Renal Guard System in Patients Undergoing CRT Implantation
DOC.criteria: 1. eligible for CRT implantation 2. estimated GFR < 60ml/min/1.73m2 1. On Dialysis 2. Sensitivity to Furosemide 3. Contraindication for urinary catheter 4. Pregnancy
